PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceThermalPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Thermal and air flow conditions of a space or zone. HISTORY: New property set in IFC 2x2.

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingAirFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Cooling air flow rate in the space.

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingAirFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Heating air flow rate in the space.

PropertyDef.Name: VentilationAirFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Ventilation outside air requirement for the space.

PropertyDef.Name: ExhaustAirFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Design exhaust air flow rate for the space.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period. Provide this value, if no temperatur range (Min-Max) is available.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceRelativeHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: The relative humidity of the space.
